title: Some sort of bug on infernal diana skin?
body:
For some reason, Everytime i play Diana with the Infernal Skin my game seams to lag/fps spike extremely bad I have no idea why, but it happens at random times during the game.

For Example; 1. I'll be farming fine then all of a sudden my auto attacks will happen without the animation.

2. I will have a 3 second delay on when i cast an ability to when it actually registers

3. 3-4 second lag spikes of where everything will stop moving for that time.

I dont know why it does it, but the last 4 times ive played infernal diana it has happened, and only on infernal diana.


Would anyone know why this is happening?

My graphic settings are on Medium, My computer normally sits around 345 Fps and 42 MS ping
when i play infernal diana it sits around, 140 fps (feels like 15 FPS) and my ping sits on 130-300 MS

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
